references.paper_title: Robust category-level 6d pose estimation with coarse-to-fine rendering of neural features
references.reason: This paper is important because it establishes a foundation of coarse-to-fine rendering of neural features for 6D pose estimation.

references.paper_title: Nemo: Neural mesh models of contrastive features for robust 3d pose estimation
references.reason: This paper is important as it uses neural mesh models and contrastive features for 3D pose estimation, which is a core component to the current DINeMo model.

references.paper_title: Beyond pascal: A benchmark for 3d object detection in the wild
references.reason: This paper is important because it establishes the PASCAL3D+ dataset as a key benchmark for 3D object detection, which is used for evaluation in this paper.

references.paper_title: Dinov2: Learning robust visual features without supervision
references.reason: This paper is important because it introduces DINOv2, which DINeMo leverages as a visual foundation model.

references.paper_title: A tale of two features: Stable diffusion complements dino for zero-shot semantic correspondence
references.reason: This paper is important as it introduces SD-DINO, which is leveraged by DINeMo to compute feature representations of the image and template mesh renderings from multiple views.
